title: Understanding Treatment Categories
text: Intellectual disability treatment can be broadly categorized into three main areas. Think about the different aspects of care and support that might be needed.

title: Consider the Underlying Causes
text: One category of treatment focuses on addressing the underlying causes of intellectual disability. This might involve medical interventions or therapies aimed at mitigating these causes.

title: Addressing Comorbid Conditions
text: Another category involves treating any comorbid physical or mental disorders that may accompany intellectual disability. This ensures a holistic approach to the individual's health.

title: Early Interventions
text: The third category includes early behavioral and cognitive interventions. These are crucial for improving the individual's developmental outcomes and quality of life.
